title: Help with IP Booster
body: I've recently bought an IP Booster and I'm having trouble finding the expiration timer for it. Does anyone know where I can find it?

replies.body: The expiration should show on your profile panel in the client.  I did take a look into this for you just in case, and do see you have a 14 day IP boost currently in effect.  It should expire around 2017-08-05.  You've got a good amount of time left!
